full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PAS GTOR MA 'BUL TSUL MDOR BSDUS BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): SU MA TI MA nI PRA DZNY'A,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг):
@005A *, ,(CES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PHYAG DRUG PA LA GTOR MA 'BUL, TSUL MDOR BSDUS BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU'I @005B ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI TSOGS 'DON DU 'DZUGS PA'I CHED DANG RNAM DPYOD SPOBS PA PHUL DU
'BYUNG BA AER TE NI KU SHRI KUN DGA' DON GRUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nI PRA DZNY'AS 'PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'O, ,)
